pages.title: Steamer
pages.text: The <item>Steamer/$ is a fast <thing>$(l:intro/fluid)steam/$ powered smoker. It can cook up to one food item per 50 ticks (4 items/second). While running, it consumes 200mB/t <thing>$(l:intro/fluid)steam/$ and produces an equal amount of <thing>$(l:intro/fluid)distilled water/$.$(br2)<thing>$(l:intro/fluid)Steam/$ is accepted in the sides and bottom, and <thing>$(l:intro/fluid)distilled water

<thing>$(l:intro/fluid)/$ can be piped out the top or bottom.$(br2)Overall, it is twice as efficient per degree of <thing>$(l:intro/heat)heat/$ as the $(l:heat/smelter)<item>smelter/$, and twice as fast as the $(l:heat/smelter)<item>smelter/$ at maximum speed.$(br2)
